file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 35-11-03-06 - CONFIG-1 - OXYGEN-CYLINDER PRESSURE-RELIEF DISC - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OXYGEN-CYLINDER PRESSURE-RELIEF DISC - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do an inspection of the oxygen-cylinder pressure-relief disc. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) OXYGEN-CYLINDER PRESSURE-RELIEF 35-11-03-200-801-A ♦ EMB-145 DISC - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 35-11-03 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 35-11-03-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. OXYGEN-CYLINDER PRESSURE-RELIEF DISC - INSPECTION A. General (1) This procedure gives instructions to do an inspection on the oxygen-cylinder pressure-relief disc. (2) Only approved persons must do the maintenance tasks in the oxygen system. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Above oxygen servicing panel H. Visually Check Oxygen Cylinder Pressure Relief Disc (Figure 601) SUBTASK 211-007-B (1) Do an inspection on the oxygen-cylinder pressure-relief disc for serviceable condition. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 CONFIG-1 35-11-03 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
